Description: Wooden anthropoid inner-coffin of Ankhesnefer; painted decoration and Hieroglyphic texts on a layer of plaster.
Curator's comments: PM I Part 2: p.828 Taylor in Davies, Colour and Painting, London 2001, p. 174, col. pl. 55 [4].
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1998-2004, Hull, Hands on History Museum, Ancient Egypt (3 year renewable loan) 2006-present, Glasgow, Kelvingrove Art Gallery and Museum, LT Loan Ancient Egypt British Museum Partnership Gallery
